website_summaries.verdict: This jacket recommends sizes by breed and has an adjustable chest, making it great for pugs, bulldogs, and other thick-chested breeds.
pros: Easy to put on with fully adjustable Velcro straps
"Magic buckle" on both sides of chest
cons: consider ordering larger if you aren't sure

customer_reviews.title: Keep my dog warm, dry, and stylin!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, my dog loves wearing it. Took it on a weekend long backpacking trip, it rained on her and she stayed dry under the jacket. The fleece was nice inside. It does run a little small, so watch that. Getting the velcro shut was a little tricky on a long haired dog, but not really an issue. Much better quality thank anticipated considering the cost. Stayed very muddy and came clean in the wash!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Deal

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!  Read reviews for sizing!
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket! I'm thankful for all the great reviews regarding sizing. My SharPei/jack Russell cross is 55 lbs, chest girth 28", neck 17, back 20. I ordered an XXL and it fits him pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she was happy to have it on our camping trip
customer_reviews.text: My dog had no gripes about the jacket, she was happy to have it on our camping trip. Seemed to be wind resistant, it could have been longer, there was a elastic loop that seemed to be for the tail but was a few inches tii short. My dog could just be long? I would suggest a larger surface area of reflective material for night use, it's just a thin strip down center of the jacket. I would say it is good for about 40 degree or so with a short hair dog. Great for the price! I love the look!! I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Markezic

customer_reviews.title: it was really cute and super easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Vinyl outer layer ripped inside the first 2 hours of wear. Shame, it was really cute and super easy to put on, great structure, poor quality. Photo shows velcro still attached with outer vinyl torn in multiple places
customer_reviews.author: lesomers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Pitt bull Lucy. She is nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jayni S.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is adjustable and good quality for the price. The medium fit my dog up to about 25 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressed with this jacket. The first day my dog wore it we were on a trail, another dog jumped on his side and the material instantly ripped. The jacket was still usable, but now after a month of use the front velcro strap around the neck has loosened and ripped as well, and continually falls off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the RAIN but, need a little more coverage please!!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is so AWESOME...but, a little too short and not fitting as expected. Love the quality & stylish "black" color, just what I was lookingfor except fit. I orderd XXXL" and for soemone reason, it's not so XXXL & coverage down back has only 18" of materialands. My suggestion would be to add apx + 4 more inches around the chest and at least 6" in length. THANKS SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.author: nicole s

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased less than two months ago and the Velcro doesn’t stay affixed anymore. Also I recommend to use only as a rain coat or windbreaker, as it doesn’t create any warmth whatsoever. I’d return it, but my dog’s fur is woven into the Velcro and inside material now. As well, I cut off the stabilizing tail-loop - my dog hated it wrapped around his tail. It wasn’t necessary, anyways. I’ll remedy my issues by sewing on new Velcro and will just use it when its raining & not too cold.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Limited Adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket. Fleece liner is warm. However, the multiple vecro adjustments are narrow. In other words, it either fits or it doesn't. You can't really adjust size. Belly section does have elastic so it will stretch. But you can't make it smaller to fit snug. Narrow velcro strips mean you have to match up just right so your dog better sit still and let you. Luckily my dog loves being dressed so he gives me full cooperation. Once on, it looks good and covers generously.
customer_reviews.author: Gil Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Way too small. I bought XXL to fit my ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I bought XXL to fit my 54lb Pit Bull. It did not fit around her chest and was way too short. The XXL would fit a 35lb dog. I ended up buying her an American made coat in size Medium. That's how small this coat was.
customer_reviews.author: Kensington

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Size Differences
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased the XXXL and it was way too big for my 65lb lab/pit mix. He measured 28" so it should have fit. I then ordered the XXL which maxes out at 28" and it barely fits him. It doesn't cover about 5 inches of his rear and the rubberband that goes over his tail just reaches. I worry the velcro closure at his chest might not hold either. The jacket itself seems really nice... the company just needs to work on the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: JBL

customer_reviews.title: First snow excursion.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this coat specifically for our Colorado vacation. Being from Texas we're not use to cold weather and Millie had never seen snow. I needed something to protect her from the elements, this jacket did the job. She was completely comfortable and at ease in it. It didn't give her a rash or irritate her sensitive skin at all. I used it in combo with another coat on extra cold adventures. The jacket seems to be water resistant, not waterproof. The belly of the coat was soaked after a 6 mile hike through the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: good coat
customer_reviews.text: I had to order an xxl for my pit mix. she is little; she's only 43 lbs but her chest is huge! the coat is a little long on her, but other than that it fits her perfect. this is much needed for the cold winter and some of the snowy/wet days we've had.
customer_reviews.author: MScarp

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my fur baby dry and warm
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area where we get a lot of snow and rain, its cold and wet most of the year. I had plenty of jackets but I figured my 100 lb dog needed something to keep him protected from the elements. I don't leave him outside but for the short periods i did let him out, this really did help him. The only downside is I seemed to have ordered the wrong size. It was too big by like 2-3 inches around his tummy. I was able to hand stitch it though so it's good now. I would recommend it to other pet owners.
customer_reviews.author: Eris

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits well, but poor quality and destroyed after 1 use for 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, fits well. I like that it is bit longer than most so it fits my pit boxer mix perfectly. However it is very thin, without much apparent warmth. I could live with that. But the exterior is SO thin that with one use and my dog playfully rolling on the ground, it ripped in multiple places and she wriggled out of it when the velcro failed.
customer_reviews.author: TarheelTwice

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is a perfect fit. I typically have a had time finding the right size. I took measurements as suggested. I ordered a XXXL for my 96 lb 2 1/2 yr old rottweiler. It appears to be if good quality. Will update after a few wears.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a medium for my 13lb chihuahua mix. It is large on her, but the intention was to be able to layer it over her sweater. I absolutely love this jacket. It’s easy to get on and off, and washes up nice. I often walk in the dark, so the reflective strip is very nice as well. Update*** I ordered a matching coat for my 80lb pit mix. It’s slightly large around her abdomen area, but fits well around her neck and chest. She has a fleece hoodie that is layered under during single digit and negative temps, so the extra room works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ccr52

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: It is very important to get the right fit. Measure your dog, read the reviews. My dog is an 8 pound terrier mix, I ordered a small, and it did did however, it covered up his private area preventing him from urinating properly. I returned it and ordered the extra small and it fit him better. I don't have to use the tail attachment. He keeps it on fine. The only thing I wish it had is that I do not put his leash on his collar. He has throat issues so I have always used a harness. It has a hole to attach the leash to the collar but not one further down to accommodate a harness.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Short Hair Dog Necessity for Winter
customer_reviews.text: Our german shorthair pointer/boxer mix enjoys having this dog coat put on him so he can stay out in the cold weather with the other long haired dogs who don't mind the cold. Yay, thank you for making our dog's life more comfortable so he can enjoy the great outdoors all year long. The coat stands up to the country lifestyle in the woods, also. I know he likes this coat; because, it is still on him hours later and not chewed. He barks for me to put his coat on and also take his coat off when he is warmer; yes, seriously.
customer_reviews.author: NAPS 2 B Fit...

customer_reviews.title: 100% worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely more of a cool weather jacket and not a COLD weather jacket. While lined with fleece it's not very thick. The outer shell definitely helps with wind and water resistance. It's a good "for now" coat for our 10 month old Scottish Deerhound. We ordered the largest size and it's still about 6 shorts short on her back, but we appreciate that the panel that covers the chest is somewhat expandable as she's barrel chested but not wide. Defintiely recommend this coat for spring, fall, and rainy and windy weather. Just not for excessively cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Eh problems with this jacket
customer_reviews.text: This dog jacket appears to be well made. I deducted one star because it had no space to hook the leash. My other dog jacket has a space to hook leash. The harness doesn't go over the jacket as well so we have not really used it which is why I deducted another star. So at this time I would not recommend purchase of this item due to it being that really usable since I have to put a harness on my dog and my harnesses and go over this jacket. And the fact that the jacket doesn't have a space to hook the leash. The jacket does appear to be well made
customer_reviews.author: A fabulous shopperTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great! Measure your dog like reccommended
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is great! It has a thicker fleece lining and a decently thick water proof fabric. The closures are Velcro, which makes putting it on and off easy. My only complaint is the lack of color selection. Be sure to measure your dog! You cannot go by regular dog sizes. I have a 15 lb chihuahua mix and she is wearing a medium comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Hamster Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this jacket is pretty good. Love the lining on the underside and that it comes in very large sizes (we have a Great Dane). In fact due to other items issues with sizing we ordered a really large one and then realized it was almost too big and probably could have ordered one size smaller! The only problem is that it ripped the first time we used it, you cannot really use the opening made to put the leash thru, it needs to be reinforced as the material is not strong enough. Other than that, great coverage and our Dane pranced like a Queen with the high collar!
customer_reviews.author: Debie W

customer_reviews.title: The reflective coat is quite good, not for rough terrain.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. It just fits. My mini Shar pei is difficult to fit, either too big or too small is the situation with most clothes. This was almost too tight around the rolls in the neck/chest area, but just makes it, but is okay for exercise, but not for sleeping in as much. I put the harness over the jacket for a walk. The outer vinyl can easily rip if the dog runs in brambles or similar, this is not a hunting dog coat unless on open land area. The reflective coat is quite good, not very thick. In cold weather, I use it as an underlay. My dog can really run in this. Good waterproof material.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: I had a really hard time finding a coat for my boy dog. The smalls were all too tiny and the mediums were all too big. This coat fits him. It's a medium and it's a little snug around the middle, but I'm very happy with it. I gave if four stars instead of five for two reasons: 1) I wish it were a little bit thicker and 2) I wish it had an opening for a back harness. Otherwise, I think it's a great value!
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: Great Coat
customer_reviews.text: After 3 tries I finally found the coat that fits my dog almost perfectly. Her measurements put her in the large to extra large size, but I needed the longer length so I took a chance on extra, extra, large. The only problem is the neck is a little loose but otherwise, it fits perfectly. Any other size would have been too small. It's easy to put on and it looks great Arrived quickly. If your dog is broad in the middle like my dog maybe you should consider a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: great quality raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought for my dog, who thought it was really cool until I attempted to walk her outside with it on one drizzly day. Positively refused to let anyone see her in public with a raincoat on! I sent it to my daughter's dog in another state, and she loved it. Thinks she's hot stuff. The raincoat is really well made, excellent quality. Stylish. I like the reflective strip, too. It does run a bit small, which they tell you to order the next size if the dogs measurements are borderline. Just really sorry mine didn't like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: but still a nice addition. I also like how it secures with ...
customer_reviews.text: Jacket fits very well, true to size guide. It is also soft on the inside and wind/water proof on the outside. The elastic on the tail is kind of a long loop so it slips off if my dog tucks his tail, but still a nice addition. I also like how it secures with velcro, it's easy to put on and take off. This would be perfect for slightly warmer climates. I am in NH and it was 0*F the other day, necessitating another, thicker jacket underneath this one. I think down to about 32*F (0*C), this jacket alone would work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little guy
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua/JRT mix who does NOT like to get wet. This fits great, is waterproof, and the inside is really soft. It’s also made with a lot more material to actually keep him warm. It’s very secure once I put it on him - there’s a large Velcro patch at the neck, and a long Velcro on each side on the bottom. I was getting tired of him losing his fleece because it only had a strap at the neck and under his belly. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: moskigirl

customer_reviews.title: I like the coat and so does my dog but even ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the coat and so does my dog but even though I measured carefully I probably should have got the next size up. I have a very well built #65 pitt bull with a big chest, I bought the XXL but its a little to short in the back which I could live with but the chest keeps popping open hulk style when he gets excited. The bigger problem with the jacket is the build quality, the front velcro strip became unstitched within a couple of days the patch then half hung off and the jacket would flop around. I ended up glueing and sewing it (twice) to get it to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Andynj

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the perfect coat
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best coat I have ever purchased for my dog. In fact, I bought a second one when I saw the fit and quality of the first one. My dog is a 13lb. Havanese. She has several coats, but this is a rain coat and warm coat all one one. It is very well made, and easy to get on and off. I put her halter over the top, and away we go! I just wish there were more than two colors to choose from. We would have a different color every day we walk!....
customer_reviews.author: scrappinmammie

customer_reviews.title: Warm enough for Windy Chicago in the Spring and Fall
customer_reviews.text: This coat is great for my Service dog during the spring and fall months in Chicago, but he needs a bit more when it's super chilly out. I also love that it's red and matches his vest and boots. One issue with the coat is the under piece flares out and sometimes he accidentally gets pee on these flare dout under pieces. I usually tuck in the flared out part, but really it would be great if they didn't flare out at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Sizing inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this jacket, but the sizing is inaccurate and extremely small. My 35 lb healthy pit bull/ dachshund mix I ordered a large for, it was too small. I even measured him. /: I would be safe and just order a size up if you're unsure because now I need to return a size large jacket for an XL and it's super cold outside so... very inconvenient for me and my pup.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ivins

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new lab pity mix as a winter coat raincoat substitute. I followed the size guide before I ordered and glad I did! It's a little big on him but I think that will be just fine. The coat is easy to clean what does take a while to dry if the fleece lining got wet. The outer layer does appear to absorb more water than a traditional raincoat. I like the bright color as it's easier to see the dog at night. It does have a hole for the leash to go through however I have not tried this yet.
customer_reviews.author: K. Langolf

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Pretty, Pretty... Pretty Good.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. My dogs are not fans of any clothing (they are basically nudists) but they don't mind these. They keep most of the pups dry and they have these cool collars that kinda make them look like vampires. Also what I missed with these was that they have a little hole for the collar to connect to the leash, pretty smart idea. My only issue is that on one of my pups, the front comes undone quite a bit, but I think that it's my fault and I should have got him a larger size because it doesn't happen with the other pup. Overall, really good item, well made and easy to throw in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! The so-called XXXL would not fit my 100 lb GSD.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Hamblin Sr

customer_reviews.title: best all around jacket
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is misleading, we had to upsize, but no big deal. We ended up buying 3 jackets, as there were as advertised. Mini schnauzer, golden retriever and giant schnauzer puppy. They all fit great and have room to move and grow. The elastic on the underbelly helps them not pee on it. Durable material. Easy on and off. Great for the rain so the stay dry allowing them to stay warmer. Thin lining so if you have a small dog or one that isn't a coated breed you may want a sweat shirt underneath for the really cold days. Our mini has a hoody on under it and it fits great
customer_reviews.author: Alley

customer_reviews.title: Thin coat. Male dog urinates on coat.
customer_reviews.text: Measured dog correctly and jacket is a little too big. He is 15 lbs and I ordered a medium because of his chest measurement. He is a male and urinates on the coat every time. The jacket is well made but very thin. The hole in the back is for a collar and doesn't work well with his harness. I do not recommend this coat for male dogs.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: I am happily shocked that my dog is still wearing this jacket after 4 days!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked that my dog, whom we should call Houdini, is still wearing this jacket after 4 days! Usually he chews them off in about 20 minutes. I assume he is still wearing it because it is more comfortable in it; unlike some jackets that tug and pull and are too tight in some places, this jacket is a perfect fit and has no way of being too tight - it is well designed. It does keep him warmer and is as described in the listing.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Zig

customer_reviews.title: It is okay for the money.
customer_reviews.text: We have a 60lb male lab mix. We've used the jacket for rain, snow and cold. There are two little flaps on the under belly are a that have great potential of getting urinated on. I try to tuck the flaps up and under but after 5 minites of walking they are out again. The collar hold is not practical for an active dog and I expect it would rip so we've been hooking the leash under the collar. With this the Velcro would come undone. I think it's okay for the price but I wish I held out for something more.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old AmStaff HATES when I try to put a sweater or anything on her that involves putting her legs through a hole. With this jacket it's just putting one foot into one hole, lifting it up and fastening it under her belly. Secure and easy, and keeps her warm and dry. I highly recommend! I purchased the XXL for my girl. She is 60 lbs, but has a large chest so I wanted to make sure it fit right. It's perfect, AND it actually is long enough, and reaches all the way down to her tail.
customer_reviews.author: Moo's mom

customer_reviews.title: Sized larger - so measure well.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute on my boy! Bought a medium size orange, but he was swimming in it. Against my hubby's suggestion to keep it and just make adjustments to it (like that's ever gonna happen!), I bought another one. A size small red one. Soooo glad I did! It fits him perfectly, and keeps him warm on those chilly evening walks. The orange one is still cute, and still untouched. Nailed it!
customer_reviews.author: SheShopsAmazonnotStores

customer_reviews.title: Gotta keep my baby seal princess warm
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice jacket for my 60 lb pit mix. Her chest is 29in and length is 22 in, so I got the 2XL and it fits great. The part that wraps under her chest has a nice elastic in it almost like a scrunchie so if it's a little big it'll shrink to fit better, if that makes sense. Also, its nice that it arrives with a plastic sheet attached so you can try it on your dog without worrying about getting hair all over it in case it doesn't fit. They also included a tape measure for your dog which I thought was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Good coat for the price. Not as thick as the old one, but covers more of her, so that's a good trade off, I think. But after all these years, why haven't these manufacturers figured out most people attach leashes to a harness, not a collar, and make another 'D' ring slot sideways for them a little farther back? I've had to modify every single coat I've ever bought because of that.
customer_reviews.author: RSM61

customer_reviews.title: The coat is fine but still runs small for a Mastiff/Pit Bull mix
customer_reviews.text: The coat is fine but still runs small for a Mastiff/Pit Bull mix. We got 2XL and I wish it was a bit bigger to give added warmth. Our dog is 100lbs with 3% body fat so it's hard to find something for his size. He's bigger than most Pits but smaller than a full Mastiff. If you have a big dog go up a size even if you thing you have already; you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is nice for the Dog on those brutal cold days and the orange color is perfect. The outside coating appears to repeal water and the inside is soft. Easy to put on and take off. Great value without spending a fortune. Be sure to look at the measurement chart when deciding what size you need and make sure to measure your dog.
customer_reviews.author: bhagg

customer_reviews.title: Happy Havapoo!
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to really like his new coat. We keep his fur trimmed short to avoid the usual matting that accompanies havapoos. With the colder weather coming in, he really needed something to help him keep warm. He will sit next to the door and wait patiently for me to put his coat on. He seems comfy in it and never fusses with it as he has done with other pet jackets. I like how easy it is to put on and remove. Overall, very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Kep

customer_reviews.title: I Do Not Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The design of the chest and belly closures are terrible- I had to take ALL of them apart and re-sew - I didn't have time to return them since we were leaving on vacation the next day. The belly piece is too long and gets urinated on by the boys - I had to cut it and re-sew that part as well - I do not recommend this item. :(
customer_reviews.author: DBKiss

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Velcro
customer_reviews.text: It seemed well made for the price. I misunderstood the pictures and thought there were elastic panels, but it was black Velcro. My dog is afraid of that sound. I could have gotten it on him once, but it would never happen again and I didn’t want to make something (a walk) that’s always been fun a battle.
customer_reviews.author: ctrish

customer_reviews.title: Had to tailor fit the coat for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews about sizing I decided to order one size up XXL for my 32.8 lb. pug-lab mix. Coat was extremely large should have ordered a L. No I didn’t return it although I should have. Instead I decided to tailor fit it for my dog. Being as though she is a unique mix breed her body length is much longer. She doesn’t like to get wet in the rain so the coat covers her back. I made the adjustments to the back seams and around the shoulders. Other than that the coat is very well made and light not thick and blucky.
customer_reviews.author: Playing Tennis 🎾

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light/medium weight rain/snow jacket. It isn't a thick coat, but has a lining. Easy on/off. A little longer on the back which is great for my short-haired chihuahua. Note: if you're on the fence on which size to buy, size up. My chihuahua is 9 pounds and the size small is great for her and offers a little extra room for both her harness and a sweater underneath for when it's really cold here in New England.
customer_reviews.author: FarmBarbie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, windproof, waterproof, warm!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog jacket ever. Very easy to slip on. Just make sure you get the side velcro pressed in good. Windproof, waterproof, cozy fleece liner, reflective strip and a slot to put the leash through. My dog loves it and I love it's easy on/off. Looks sharp and is good for all types of weather...cold, rain, high wind, etc. A Keeper!
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect, and he doesn’t get pee on it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this jacket! It was exactly what I was looking for: waterproof, warm, enough coverage on our dog’s tummy(very little hair) but not so much that he pees on the jacket! The 3XL fits well, even a little loose. His chest girth is 33” so it has been difficult to find a good fit. He is a mutt so he has a body shape that is not average for a certain breed. This jacket was perfect and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Camino

customer_reviews.title: Size up & you'll be happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered XXL for my 50 lbs, 7 month old Australian Shepherd fur baby and it fits perfectly. Not very snug fit but there is room to grow. And specially the scrunched style on the belly makes it fit. Only issue with it is not too warm but definitely water resistant and will work with central western weather. Note: he was not bothered and looked comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jbaweja

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We didnt get caught in heavy rain yet so i cant comment about waterproof but the fabric is such that drops of water kind of roll off of it. Its very warm and covers my dog well. I really like the front chest coverage. One problem ive had with coats before is the fabric will catch on his fur and will pull downward but he doesnt have that problem with this coat. It has reflective stitching that is very bright. Everyone has commented now beautiful it is. I bought the blue one. thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great. I am a happy buyer and I would recommend. My yorkie looks good and it's really warm material. I have no complaints. Very happy with this purchase. Took a picture to show how good my yorkie looks. Fast shipper too. Thank you seller
customer_reviews.author: Pdani

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove on a 72lb labradoodle.
customer_reviews.text: First impression: Good quality. I like the design. It’s easy to put on/off. My husband has a 72lb labradoodle. She is a massive beauty. It is very difficult to find a coat suitable for her size. I ordered an 3XL and it fits her like a glove. PS: Thank you for the inch/metric tape measure.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. BuBu

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my doggie dry and warm. Sharp fit.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my doggie dry and warm on most autumn and winter days (temps above 32 degrees) in our mid-Atlantic town. And the svelte fit garners him so many compliments from neighbors. It's also roomy enough to fit a snug second sweater or lightweight fleece jacket underneath. We're, however, getting an additional heavier jacket with more body coverage for temperatures below freezing.
customer_reviews.author: tunya cosby

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket watch the size
customer_reviews.text: the quality of the jacket is great! The velcro looks like it will last a long time ... I have a problem with the sizing of the jacket tho' . They are on the small size. I have 3 dogs, and a jacket for all three ... I have a puggle (beagle/pug mix) ... he requires an XXL because of the girth issues, but the jacket it too long ... I have a Lab-beagle mix that is smaller than a LAB (~50 LB.) that requires and XXL as well, but it is a little tight on her. I have a Shepherd-Rottweiler mix?? that requires an XXXL and his is a little on the tight side around his chest.
customer_reviews.author: D. Batt

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well if your dog has a lot of fur
customer_reviews.text: I really like this jacket, I would give it 5 stars however after my dog wore this jacket, as she would shed her fur, it ended up getting caught in the Velcro, while she’s okay, an attempt to get the fur out of the Velcro resulted in the Velcro ripping and now we are unable to keep it on her without the Velcro coming off, a bummer considering how cold it has been lately.
customer_reviews.author: Anna G

customer_reviews.title: Rainy Weather
customer_reviews.text: I like that the rain jacket covers the length of my dog's back and is made of water resistant material to keep my dog dry during our walks in the rain. The velcro fastening underneath, covering my dog's stomach, is good but the length seems to be a little too long. Overall, the rain jacket is water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Janell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Georgia winter jacket
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome for my Maltese!! It's a perfect fit (I measured my puppy dog and used the size chart to order his size.) He looks so adorable in his new jacket! This is what I would call a medium weight jacket. It's perfect for Georgia winters; probably not heavy enough for Minnesota winters... I like that there is elastic in the stomach area so it fits that area of his body perfectly. He puts one foot through the leg opening and I attach the velcro around his chest and then under his stomach - easy on/easy off. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: gayleg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you're considering it, get it! I bought a Medium and it fit my dog perfectly. She is about 19 lbs and thin. Great quality, fits her well, and I have no problems leaving her outside if it's chilly, as it keeps her warm (and she gets cold easily). Best coat I've owned for her, by far. Will last quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Medium size dog - Ordered XL
customer_reviews.text: The coat itself is great. Easy to get on and off, repels the water. Seems warm enough for my old dog but the size does not fit. My dog is skinny because she is 15 years old and this just fits her. I ordered a XL and if she was at her normal weight it would not of fit. Its hard to tell in the picture her height but she only goes up to my knee and I'm 5' 4". The length is to short as well
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Winter Coat that covers the Belly
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tsu has 2 of these wonderful coats. They keep him warm all over,, especially his belly. I love the bright colors and the reflector strip. What a great product and a great value. I especially appreciated the measuring guide for my little dog. Thank you for this quality service.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Schmoo

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run large
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions, ordered a 4xl for my rotty doberman based on the instructions to order based on chest size. It's too big. I have not washed it yet, but as it is made from ripstop fabric, I don't expect it to shrink. It still keeps him warm. I can sew, and will take it in rather than return. I don't want to bother with returning and ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is weird but good coat
customer_reviews.text: We have a pit-boxer-lab-mix who gets cold easily. Getting a good fit was difficult due to his large rib cage and he only weighs 60 pounds. According to the size chart he needed XXXL but it swallowed him. Returned for XL and it was too small around his chest. Ordered XXL and it just barely fits his chest. He's comfortable enough to go outside with it but not enough to wear it inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lizard Leg

customer_reviews.title: Too much trouble to put on. Too many Velcro ...
customer_reviews.text: Too much trouble to put on. Too many Velcro fasteners. My dog let me put it on her briefly--just one time, but it didn't fit well. After the 1st time, she ran under the bed and hid when she saw me coming with it.
customer_reviews.author: Storyteller

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My puppies are fine wearing this jacket and it is relatively easy to put on. I was hoping it would cover a little bit more of their fur under their bellies, but very few coats do. This covers more than most. I have ordered many styles of coats for my wheaten terrier puppies. This one seems to be really good for dogs with a big rib cage. It fits mine fine, but they could grow many many more inches in their stomach and it would still fit them whereas as they grow they could benefit from more length.
customer_reviews.author: CMG

customer_reviews.title: You should probably order 1-2 sizes larger.
customer_reviews.text: I am not too thrilled about this. Firstly I measured my dog according to the size chart and it turns out the jacket was 1-2 sizes short. Secondly the material feels really light. I can't image this jacket serving the purpose of a "winter" coat for a southern dog at least. I was contemplating exchanging this item but I decided to just return it. Did not test it but am not hopeful. I gave 3 stars instead of 1-2 solely because the customer service was very quick to respond and told me how to exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good. But the fasteners did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Quality is good. But the fasteners did not work for me. For one, there's too many of them. Second, the strips are small and narrow, so if you don't get them exactly right, they're prone to coming undone, and there's no leeway for size. If you choose this jacket, make sure that your measurements are close to exact. My dog has a thick neck and chest, and a narrow body. This jacket was not a good fit for him, given the design. But it is a quality jacket.
customer_reviews.author: mauiturlock

customer_reviews.title: Reversible easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Reversible easy to put on, has a hole for leash. My lil one Hamish is a mini schnauzer yorkie mix (looks just like Toto) and it fits perfect. Keeps him warm and dry. I also like that it has a collar instead of a hood so keeps his neck warm too, without blocking his vision like some hooded dog raincoats have (i usually fold that style back) So its a nice added detail to the coat. Def would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Harlow

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality
customer_reviews.text: Cheap quality and materials. I wanted to buy something cheaper than something else I was looking at. But I definitely had no problem with buying the dog jacket I wanted in the first place (not from this company/vendor). Maybe it's only good as a visual aid to convince you to buy from somewhere else. I'm sure some people may find this jacket fine, but I live where it rains most of the year and only wanted it for light rain. I wouldn't go with it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great but waaaay too big
customer_reviews.text: After carefully measuring and checking all the available information I chose size 'S' for my 4lbs Chi-mix. I don't know who came up with these measurements but its laughable. Even the next smaller size (had it been available) would still be too big. Too bad, because overall I liked this one very much. Sturdy quality, great color, seemed warm and comfy. Sadly, I had to returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sil

customer_reviews.title: My dogs got it off in no time.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great coat. It looks good, etc. I bought one for both of my dogs. They both had it off in no time. I made sure to secure the velcro well, but they still got it off. One of the dogs had it in his mouth for a short time before I got it from her and it ripped. I expected it to be better made.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: just what a short haired dog needs for cold rain
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket for my dog. I normally think such things are ridiculous but after walking in a cold rain for a long distance my 30 lbs short haired mutt was shivering. I had to order a large - make certain to follow the measurements. Not only is this functional but its attractive. The fleece lining makes it warm. I think it looks much better than the raincoat single layer styles. It fits well and is easy to get on and off with the velcro closers
customer_reviews.author: Meala Datura

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is very small
customer_reviews.text: The pet coat sizing is very small. Please measure carefully. I have a 85 lb lab and although I went one size bigger, the coat still did not cover her completely. In addition because she is very strong, the Velcro came apart several times. It should not do that since the fabric is loose around her middle. I am going to sew one side to ensure it does not pull apart when she walks. I like that its fleece lined and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Cms

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised, works as described, quality construction, comfortable for our sweet dog
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. Our dog does not like rain, and this coat keeps him dry when he takes us out for a walk. The fit is perfect, making it easy to put on him and remove after use. I am particularly pleased with the sturdy construction. We ordered the black coat, and our neighbors love it. The collar of the coat stands up and our neighbors joke that he looks like Dracula. I would definitely purchase another item from this company.
customer_reviews.author: BZMDNana

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for this quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making sure a great fitting jacket for my doggie! Most don’t fit comfortably across his chest and this one is made so it fits exactly right. Comfortable, warm, nice stitching and nice material. Thanks you for this quality jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Rosenberger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dog jacket
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our rescue dog who does not like getting wet. Plus his chest has little hair to keep him warm in the winter. He loves it! This is the easiest dog jacket I’ve tried. I couldn’t fit any other store bought jackets on him because he’s barrel chested. This is a wonderfully designed jacket that keeps the water off him and keeps him warm. I highly recommend it for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Me

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: All edges on the jacket that will rub on your dog are layered with a nice soft fabric. Velcro bottom sinch works well. Fit is perfect. Material is great! I know some, like me, guesstimate.. but let me tell you that measuring your pup is worth it. At first glance my pup looked like a L but after measuring him he was noted to be an XL. Went with that and it fit like a glove! Would gladly purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kennprez909

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. Also, the jacket keeps my Rotty warm during cold temps & dry when it rains. The only thing is I don’t know what to do with the string on the back of the jacket. Btw, I like the reflector on the jacket too, so if I am walking her in the evening she will be noticed. I would suggest adding another stripe on the sides too for extra safety. Also, where does the string at the end of jacket go and/or is it used to hand jacket up? Where does it go? Lol. I will be ordering another jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok if your dog doesn't play
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to get on our dog the reason I gave it 3 stars it lasted 3 weeks. Our dog plays with the neighbor dog and they destroyed it just playing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Great for a long dog body type
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua/ pug mix she is long, skinny and tall this fits perfectly. This was just what I was looking for, for my dog's body type. It's also great quality it looks like a horse blanket I purchased the orange.
customer_reviews.author: KMMT

customer_reviews.title: Multi purpose
customer_reviews.text: I like the Petcee jacket. It's a multi purpose jacket. It's lightweight but it seems to be warm enough. I'd recommend the Petcee jacket. We own three.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my barrel chested Border Collie mix. When we put it on him it was far too tight around the chest. So we put it on our Pit Bull mix and it fits perfect. It's easy to put on and he looks like he's wearing a bro tank polo when you pop the collar. All in all, great buy but if you're on the fence about the size, go a size larger!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Horrible size chart
customer_reviews.text: Size chart is wildly inaccurate just as others are saying. Runs extremely small. Good luck getting the right fit. Couldn’t hurt to order XXL for a smaller medium breed. Personally, I decided to return my order and not buy again because it’s unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: kara cooperr

customer_reviews.title: works great for our pup
customer_reviews.text: Our pup hates the rain and this little jacket is just the thing to help! He is 16in long and about 20 lbs and the medium is perfect on him. He gets so many compliments! It is easy on and off and keeps him warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret H

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting coat for my dog!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have at least 6 other coats for my 6 lb. Papillon. He HATES every one of them. Finally the Petcee coat is long enough too cover his entire back AND, the best part..., it doesn't pull over his head. I discovered that having to put just one leg thru the hole is much easier than a 2-hole step in coat. The smaller amount of velcro doesn't get caught in his long hair. YAY!!! a coat that fits, covers my dog, and he loves it!!! Have spent 2X and 3X the amount on other coats that will just be sitting in the closet. May have to look at other colors of this coat.
customer_reviews.author: SPM

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and functional.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a size Small for my 11 lb Jack Russell and it’s a perfect fit. She looks adorable in the orange color! Because there’s a hole in the back of the jacket, it works perfectly with our harness for walks. It is easy to put on since it uses Velcro around her body rather than going over the head and arms. She stays comfortable on morning walks now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Womack

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit - read other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and was able to get the proper fit for both of my dogs. My pit boxer mix fits the xl - he's 60 lbs. My pug fits a L - hes 26 lbs. Both look good, seemed warm; and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie

customer_reviews.title: Frat boy astronaut
customer_reviews.text: With this collar popped, my dog looks like a mix between a frat boy and an astronaut. He doesn't mind it though. Wearing it this past weekend in 35 degree weather he seemed cool with it. Good buy for the price but not sure how long this thing will last
customer_reviews.author: Matt Reen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold and rainy weather!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my 30lb French bulldog a size large and it fits him perfectly. It’s cozy fleece on the inside and thick enough to keep him warm and dry without being too bulky. I especially like that the belly area is gathered and elastic so he can lift his leg to go potty without getting any on the jacket. The tail loop doesn’t work for him so it will get trimmed off. It came with a flexible measuring tape too.
customer_reviews.author: Riles

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Jacket, but tends to slip off my smooth-coated dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice jacket - We live in Maine, and it gets very COLD. My only complaint is that the material is slippery inside and outside. If you have a fluffy dog, this may not matter, but my dog is a German Shorthaired Pointer, and his coat is short, slick and shiny. If fits him snugly, but as he rides in the big dog crate in my car (which is full of soft fluffy quilts), and changes position, the coat slips off of him. I often come back to the car, and it's half or completely slid off. I'm trying to figure out a way to keep it on him.
customer_reviews.author: Jo in Maine

customer_reviews.title: Great rain jacket
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is great. It goes on easy, and the velcro is still strong after 6 months of use in rainy Florida. I like that it has a soft, fleece interior, which will be great for the winter. It is also light enough to use in the summer. The outer material is water repelant, and has kept our Jack Russell terrier dry on all of our rainy walks, even in major thunderstorms.
customer_reviews.author: OjosCafe

customer_reviews.title: PETCEE FLEECE COAT
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is perfect for my 50 lb female Blue tick Coon Hound. I personally bought a lager one so its roomier, as the XXl fits her snug. Other than that, you will love this jacket. It will keep them warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Epp

customer_reviews.title: It was cheap plastic like material with very thin fleece on the inside
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all what I thought it would be. It was cheap plastic like material with very thin fleece on the inside. I also ordered it a size bigger that was supposed to fit a golden retriever and it did not fit my dog which is smaller than a golden. Definitely returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrey Smolinsky

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Stop Button
customer_reviews.text: I have an extra-long Shih Tzu and this fits him perfectly. I like it, because it helps me see him in underbrush as well as protects him form rain and cold. He.... doesn't have such shining reviews, at least not when we first put it on him. He freezes up and doesn't want to moves, yet after about 5 minutes he's okay with it. We have to kind of push him out the door and eventually he's all good with it.
customer_reviews.author: Mooma Rocha

customer_reviews.title: (my dog may be odd shaped) but with a few minor adjustments it is great. It is definitely a good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have an 8lb chihuahua and got the medium because i wanted the length to fully cover him so it made the chest a bit too big. Item fits ok, (my dog may be odd shaped) but with a few minor adjustments it is great. It is definitely a good quality. Item arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

product_meta.title: PETCEE Waterproof Dog Jacket, Soft Fleece Lined Dog Coat for Winter, Outdoor Sports Pet Vest Snowsuit Apparel Double Surface
feature_bullets: MATERIAL: 100% Fleece Lined and 100% Polyester Surface.Waterproof and windproof, keep your dog warm in winter cold snow weather.

Characteristic:This jacket the fabric is made of 2 layer outside the cotton is between them.That design can sell ensure your pet won't be trembling in cold whiter date and pre side the nylon will make waterproof!
Creative:This one is different as old one,it can be wore inside and outside.These side is of different color style and the zipper of back is double surface at the mean time much board the before!
Please notice that:Our package is big tag "PetCee",please choose the product sold by PetCee for safe shopping!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
